actions.title: Scimitar
actions.content: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 +1) slashing damage.

actions.title: Light Crossbow
actions.content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 +1) piercing damage.

name: Steel Defender
hit_points: 2 + your Intelligence modifier + 5 times your artificer level (the defender has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your artificer level)

actions.title: Force-Empowered Rend
actions.content: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d8 + PB force damage.

actions.title: Repair (3/Day)
actions.content: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore 2d8 + PB hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reactions.title: Deflect Attack
reactions.content: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.

name: Bestial Spirit
armor_class: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)
hit_points: 20 (Air only) or 30 (Land and Water only) + 5 for each spell level above 2nd
speed: 30 ft., climb 30 ft. (Land only), fly 90 ft. (Air only), swim 30 ft. (Water only)

traits.title: Flyby (Air Only)
traits.content: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.title: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
traits.content: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.title: Water Breathing (Water Only)
traits.content: The beast can breathe only underwater.

actions.title: Multiattack
actions.content: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.title: Maul
actions.content: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 + the spell's level piercing damage.
